data.text: Mɨnek Sande man tɨkak won ak, bin tun Jisas ayɨp Galili nɨb owlak okok, kɨli ñɨg kuy tep owep ak gɨlɨtep gɨlak ak dɨl, dad Jisas nop kamɨlak ak amnɨlak.
Amɨl nɨgɨlak, kab kolɨm awl chɨp kaw tub mɨgan ak pɨl gɨlak ak, mɨmlokɨd am ke okok yek.
Pen kɨli mɨgan anɨb ak amɨl nɨgɨlak, Bɨawl Jisas nop dɨ kamɨlak kaw mɨgan ayaŋ ma yek.
24.4 Apo 1.10 Tɨtay dup agɨl, gos pal yɨbɨl lɨlɨg nɨg yelaknɨŋ, bɨ omɨŋal chech kayɨg ñɨñakol gak ak yɨmɨlek okok, kɨli gol sɨŋak jakɨl mɨdelek.
24.5 Luk 2.9 Kɨli nɨŋɨd, jel ag pɨlɨkɨl kɨgom yɨmɨl wɨdɨn kɨli lum okyaŋ nɨgɨlaknɨŋ, bɨ omɨŋal anɨb ak agɨlek, Taynen bɨ koŋɨm mɨdeb ak nop chɨp kabal nab anɨb okok pɨyow nɨgebɨm agɨlek?
24.6-7 Mat 16.21, 17.22-23, 20.18-19, Mak 8.31, 9.31, 10.33-34, Luk 9.22, 18.31-33 Ne awl ma mɨdeb. Mɨneyɨl tɨkjakup agɨlek. Pen Galili plopens mɨdɨl nɨbop takaw agak ak gos nɨgɨnɨmɨb agɨlek.

Nɨbop agak, Kɨli Bɨ Olap Ñɨne nop chen mɨmug gɨ dapɨl, binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal ak kɨlop yokel, nop mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lel kumnɨmuŋ agak agɨlek. Ñɨn omɨŋal nokom mɨdɨl, tɨkjakɨnɨgab agak agɨlek.
Anɨb agɨlek nɨŋɨd, gos kɨlop ak pag yɨkek, Jisas ned Galili mɨdɨl takaw agak anɨb ak nɨgɨlak.

24.9-10 Mak 16.10, Luk 8.3 Nɨŋɨd, tep adɨkɨd apɨl, tap gek nɨgɨlak anɨb ak, Jisas bɨ takaw nop dad ameb anep agɨp ak sek, binɨb ne yokɨp ogɨnap sek, kɨlop agñɨlak. Bin tun takaw agñɨlak anɨb ak, Maliya taun Makdala nɨb abe, Jowana abe, Jemis nonɨm ne Maliya abe, bin yokɨp ogɨnap sek.
24.11 Mak 16.11, Luk 24.25 Pen kɨli anɨgɨl agñelak nɨŋɨd, takaw kɨlop ak ma nɨgɨlak. Kɨli tay yepɨs agebal agɨl nɨgɨlak.
Pita pen takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, kasek yɨbɨl adaŋ amɨl kamɨlak kab mɨgan ak sɨpsɨp nɨgak, chech nop kam sɨlokɨlak bad okok nep yek. Nɨŋɨd, tɨtay dup agɨl gos pal yɨbɨl lɨlɨg nɨŋɨd, tep adɨkɨd amnak.
Ñɨn anɨb ak bɨ omɨŋal Jelusalem kelɨgɨl, man sɨkol Emeyus wulep sɨŋak yek amnɨlek.
Amɨlɨg, tap tɨtay dak okok takaw ak kɨmɨgel agɨlɨg amnɨlek.
24.15 Mat 18.20, Luk 24.36 Agɨlɨg amnɨlek nɨŋɨd, Jisas kud okok apɨl kɨli ayɨp amnak.
24.16 Jon 20.14, 21.4 Bɨ omɨŋal ak Jisas nop nepɨlep ak pen, God gos kɨlop ak gek Jisas nop nɨgel bɨ ak ke tek lak.
Ne kɨlop agnɨŋɨd agak, Ñɨli tɨtay agɨlɨg amebil agak? Anɨb agek kɨlop mapen gek jakɨl yelek,
24.18 Jon 19.25 bɨ olap yɨb ne Kliyopas ne agak, Nad nokom ma nepan akaŋ agak? Mɨñɨl ñɨn awl Jelusalem tap geb ak, nad ma nepan akaŋ agak?
Agek agak, Tap anɨb ak tay agak?

24.20-21 Luk 1.68, 2.38, 19.11, 23.1, Apo 1.6, 13.27-28 Anɨgek, gos chɨn nɨŋɨd agɨnok, ne apɨl chɨnop Yislel binɨb dɨl kod mɨdtep gɨnɨgab agɨl nɨgɨnok ak pen, bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl okok sek, bɨnonɨm okok sek, kɨli takaw ag nan gɨlak. Takaw ag nan gɨl nop dɨñel, bɨ kɨli ogɨnap dam mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lel kumak agɨlek. Tap anɨb ak mɨyadil gak agɨlek.
24.22 Mat 28.8, Mak 16.10, Luk 24.1-11, Jon 20.18 Mɨñɨl pen tawn won ak, bin chɨn ogɨnap nop kamɨlak kaw tub ak nɨgɨnɨg amɨl, apɨl chɨnop tap tɨtay gup ak agñel nɨŋɨd ju dɨpun agɨlek.
Kɨli apal, Chɨp ak ma yek apal agɨlek. Ensel omɨŋal ak apɨl anɨb apil, Ne tɨkjakɨl koŋɨm mɨdeb apil apal agɨlek.
24.24 Jon 20.3-10 Anɨb agel, bɨ chɨn ogɨnap kaw tub amɨl nepal, bin okok apal tek nep yek agɨlek. Pen Jisas nop ma nepal agɨlek.
Anɨb agel Jisas agak, Ñɨli gos tep ma nepil agak. Bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok, kɨli bɨlel agɨl tɨkɨlak ak, taynen nɨŋɨd agɨlak agɨl kasek ma nepil agak?
24.26 Luk 9.22, 24.44, Apo 17.3, 1 Pi 1.11 God takaw ak agak tek, Bɨ God nop aglup ak, ne ned yɨpɨl awl dɨl kumnɨmuŋ nɨm, kɨdek bɨawl teplep yɨbɨl kɨles tɨmel ak yenɨgab agak.

24.27 Stt 3.15, Nam 21.9, Lo 18.15, Sng 22.1-21, Ais 7.14, 53.7, Dan 9.24, Mal 3.1, Jon 13.31, Apo 3.13 Anɨb agɨl, kɨlop bɨ omɨŋal takaw nop mɨdupsek agñɨ tep gak. Mosis ne takaw nop tɨkak ak sek, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok mɨdupsek takaw nop tɨkɨlak ak sek, takaw mɨdupsek agñɨ tep gak.
Pen bɨ omɨŋal anɨb ak man wulep amelek anɨb sɨŋak amjakɨl, Jisas kɨlop kelɨgɨl ne ned amnɨg tek gek,
kɨli nop takaw kɨles gɨl agɨlek, Dugep day won ak apobun agɨlek. Sɨb gɨnɨgeb nen, ape chɨl ayɨp mɨdon agɨlek. Agel, kɨli bɨ omɨŋal ayɨp amnɨlak.
24.30 Mat 14.19, Luk 22.19 Kal am mɨdɨl, tap ñɨŋɨnɨg besɨgel, ne tap mɨdup ak dɨl, God nop tep agɨl, tɨpagɨl, kɨlop bɨ omɨŋal ñak.
Ñak nɨŋɨd, gos kɨlop ak pag yɨkek, ak Jisas nep agɨl nɨgɨlek nɨŋɨd, kɨmɨgel kul gak.
Anɨgek nɨŋɨd anɨb agɨlek, Kanɨb nab okok apɨlɨg, takaw ogɨnap agñɨlɨg, God takaw tɨkɨlak takaw jɨj ak abe agñɨlɨg gek, mapen chɨl ak tɨkjakup agɨlek.
Anɨb agɨl, won anɨb ak nep tep adɨkɨd Jelusalem amɨl nɨgɨlek, bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb anep agɨp ak sek, binɨb kɨli ogɨnap sek apnan gɨl mɨdelak.
24.34 1 Ko 15.4-5 Amjakɨlek nɨŋɨd, kɨlop bɨ omɨŋal agɨlak, Nɨŋɨd apun agɨlak. Bɨawl ak kumub ak pen, jɨtep ak tɨkjakɨl, Saymon yek sɨŋak apek nɨgup agɨlak.
Agel kɨli pen agɨlek, Chɨl abe kanɨb nab okok amol, ne chɨlop nebeŋ pakek kal chɨl ak ayɨp amnɨnok agɨlek. Tap ñɨŋɨnɨg gɨl, ne tap mɨdup ak dɨl God nop tep agek, ak Jisas nep agɨl nopul agɨlek.
Takaw anɨb ak agɨlek nɨŋɨd, Jisas nab anɨb sɨŋak mɨseŋ lɨl agak, Nɨbi mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨb agak.
Agek, kɨli chɨp kawnan agɨl pɨlɨkelak
kɨlop agak, Taynen yɨp Jisas agɨl ma nɨŋɨd, gos kuŋay nɨgebɨm agak?
Anɨb ak ñɨn tob yɨp okok nɨgɨm agak. Yad ke mɨdebin agak. Chɨp kawnan agɨl nepɨm ak yɨp dɨnɨgɨm agak. Yad yɨpɨl tɨŋɨl sek mɨdebin agak.
Anɨb agɨlɨg, ñɨn tob ne okok kɨlop yomek nɨŋɨd,
24.41 Jon 21.5 kɨli mɨñmɨñ gɨlɨg gos pal lɨlɨg, Jisas nep agɨl gos tam sek nɨgelak kɨlop agak, Nɨbi tap mɨdup ogɨnap mɨdeb akaŋ agak?
Agek nop kubsal dap agɨl lak pɨs kɨd ak ñɨl,
nɨg mɨdɨlak nɨŋɨd ñɨŋak.

Pen ne kɨlop agak, Ned nɨb ayɨp mɨdɨl, nɨbop agñelɨgɨpin, Bɨlel tap okok mɨdupsek yɨp kɨl tɨkɨlak ak, yɨp anɨgɨnɨmuŋ agɨl agñelɨgɨpin agak. Takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb takaw kɨli ak abe, Buk Kɨmep takaw ak abe, tap okok mɨdupsek yɨp anɨgɨnɨmuŋ agɨl agñelɨgɨpin agak.
Anɨb agɨl, yad gen kɨli God takaw bɨlel ak nɨgtep gɨlaŋ agɨl, gos teplep yɨbɨl ak ñɨlɨg

24.46 Sng 22, Ais 50.6, 52.14–53.12, Hos 6.2, Luk 24.26, Apo 17.3 kɨlop anɨb agak, Takaw anɨb ak bɨlel kɨl tɨkɨl agɨlak, Bɨ God nop aglup ak, yɨpɨl awl dɨl kumɨl ñɨn omɨŋal nokom mɨdɨl tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgab agɨlak agak.

24.47 Ais 49.6, 49.22, Jer 31.34, Mai 4.2, Mal 1.11, Mat 28.19, 1 Ti 3.16 Tɨkjakek, bɨne yɨb ne ak dɨl, kɨli Jelusalem jɨj gɨl, takaw agñɨl ag dad amɨl, takaw anɨb ak binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop agñɨnɨgel agɨlak. Anɨb agñɨnɨgel, Nɨbi tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl kelɨgem, God tap tɨmel nɨbop tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨnɨgab agñɨnɨgel agɨlak agak.
24.48 Jon 15.27, Apo 1.8, 1.22, 2.32 Nɨbi ke tap gak anɨb okok nepɨm, takaw ak mɨdupsek agñɨnɨmɨb agak.

24.49 Ais 44.3, Jol 2.28, Jon 14.16, 14.26, 15.26, 16.7, Apo 1.4 Pen Bapi ned aglak tek, yad tap anɨb ak agyoken nɨbop ownɨgab agak. Jelusalem awl nep mɨdɨl kod mɨdem, God kɨles ne ak alaŋ nɨb apɨl, nɨbop goŋ lɨnɨgab agak.
Anɨb agɨl, kɨlop poŋɨd man sɨkol Betani amɨl, ñɨn dad aplanɨlɨg agak, Bapi, nad ge mɨdtep gɨlaŋ agak.
24.51 Jon 20.17, Epe 4.8 God nop anɨgɨl agnɨgaknɨŋ, God nop dad man ne alaŋ amnak.
24.52 Jon 14.28, 16.22 Kɨli nɨŋɨd, kɨgom yɨm gɨlɨg yɨb nop ak dad aplanɨl, mɨñmɨñ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨlɨg adɨkɨd Jelusalem amnɨlak.
24.53 Apo 2.46, 5.42 Amɨl, mɨnek mɨnek God agnɨgep kal awl kab wali kus gɨl yek ak mɨgan ayaŋ am mɨdɨl, God nop tep agelɨgɨpal.
